SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.reportviews.performance

Class FirstAndMissingTradingDays

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.reportviews.performance.FirstAndMissingTradingDays
public class FirstAndMissingTradingDays extends Object
Comprehensive trading day metadata for performance report validation and date selection.

This immutable class contains all necessary trading day information required for performance analysis, including data boundaries, holiday calendars, missing quote detection, and period limits. It serves as the foundation for validating user date selections and ensuring data quality in performance calculations.

Key components include:

  • Trading day boundaries (first, latest, historical reference points)
  • Holiday and missing quote calendars for data quality validation
  • Period limits for appropriate aggregation level selection
  • Utility methods for date validation and calendar checking

    • allHolydays

      public final Set<Date> allHolydays
      Set of all holidays affecting the holdings in the analysis scope.

      Contains both global holidays (such as New Year's Day and Christmas) and security-specific market closures based on the exchanges where held securities are traded. This set is used internally for trading day validation and is excluded from JSON serialization to reduce API response size and avoid exposing internal validation data.

    • missingQuoteDays

      public final Set<Date> missingQuoteDays
      Set of trading days where end-of-day price quotes are missing for held securities.

      Identifies specific dates where historical price data is incomplete or unavailable, preventing accurate performance calculations. Missing quotes can result from data provider issues, market disruptions, trading halts, or incomplete data loading processes. This set is used internally for data quality validation and is excluded from JSON serialization.

  • Constructor Details

    • FirstAndMissingTradingDays

      public FirstAndMissingTradingDays(LocalDate firstEverTradingDay, LocalDate secondEverTradingDay, LocalDate lastTradingDayOfLastYear, LocalDate leatestPossibleTradingDay, LocalDate latestTradingDay, LocalDate secondLatestTradingDay, Set<Date> allHolydays, Set<Date> missingQuoteDays)
      Constructs a new trading day metadata instance with all required boundaries and calendars.
      Parameters:
      firstEverTradingDay - the earliest trading day in holdings history
      secondEverTradingDay - the second trading day for baseline calculations
      lastTradingDayOfLastYear - the last valid trading day of previous year
      leatestPossibleTradingDay - the most recent date with complete data (holidays only)
      latestTradingDay - the most recent trading day with complete quote data
      secondLatestTradingDay - the second most recent trading day with complete data
      allHolydays - set of all holidays affecting the holdings
      missingQuoteDays - set of days with missing price quotes
